title: Mass. woman charged in NC Publishers Clearing House scam
author: Morgan Rousseau
bullets: Local News Authorities say a Marlborough woman helped swindle a North Carolina man out of $500,000 in a fake prize scheme.
A Massachusetts woman is being charged in connection with an alleged Publishers Clearing House impersonation scam that authorities say bilked a North Carolina man out of roughly $500,000.
An arrest warrant for Sabrina Johnson, of Marlborough, was issued on Dec.

title: Boston woman flummoxed after rat makes a home in stroller she left on porch
author: Morgan Rousseau
bullets: Local News Boston Reddit did not mince words when it came to the best way of evicting this brazen stroller squatter.
A Boston woman is dealing with an unwelcome tenant on her front porch — a rat that has turned a baby stroller into a cozy winter hideaway.
The woman shared her ordeal Thursday on the r/Boston subreddit, explaining that she had left her stroller, complete with a muff, on her second-floor porch.

title: Payton Pritchard leads Celtics in bounce-back win over the Raptors: 8 takeaways
author: Tom Westerholm
bullets: Boston Celtics Boston shot a season-low 28 three-pointers, but made 14 of them.
Payton Pritchard finished Friday’s game with a team-high 27 points 12-for-19 shooting.
Matthew J.

title: Another ICE protest is planned for Saturday at JFK federal building
author: Morgan Rousseau
bullets: Local News The protest is one of dozens of similar demonstrations planned across Massachusetts this weekend in the wake of the fatal shooting of Renee Good.
People held candles at the vigil was held at "The Embrace" on Boston Common after the death of Renee Nicole Good in Minneapolis during a confrontation with ICE.
John Tlumacki/Globe Staff A protest is planned in Boston on Saturday following the fatal shooting of a woman by a U.

title: Ann Michael Maye has a new baking TV show following successful ‘Bakemas’
author: Kaley Brown
bullets: New England Patriots The first episode of “Beyond Bakemas” with Ann Michael Maye, Drake Maye’s wife, airs Sunday on NBC 10 Boston and NBC Sports Boston.
Ann Michael Maye’s stardom continues to grow.
AP Photo/Carolyn Kaster Ann Michael Maye’s husband, Drake Maye, is the star of the Patriots on the field right now.

title: Stefon Diggs’s arraignment pushed back to Feb. 13, per court documents
author: Kaley Brown
bullets: New England Patriots Diggs’s court date for strangulation and assault charges was originally set for Jan.
Stefon Diggs is facing felony and misdemeanor charges.

title: Red Sox slated to play 5 games on NBC, Peacock in 2026 as MLB returns to the network
author: Kaley Brown
bullets: Boston Red Sox Boston will host the Yankees at Fenway Park in a Sunday Night Baseball contest on June 28.
NBC and Peacock televised a game between the Red Sox and White Sox in 2022, NBC’s first since 2000.

Danielle Parhizkaran/Globe Staff By Kaley Brown January 9, 2026 | 6:21 PM 2 minutes to read The Red Sox are set to play several nationally-televised, primetime games in 2026 as Major League Baseball returns to NBC/Peacock.

title: Chargers standout RB says he’ll play vs. Patriots after missing practice time due to injury
author: Conor Roche
bullets: New England Patriots Chargers running back Omarion Hampton is one of six players the team ruled as questionable for Sunday's game against the Patriots.
Chargers running back Omarion Hampton has missed several games due to a pair of ankle injuries this season.

(AP Photo/William Liang) By Conor Roche January 9, 2026 | 4:22 PM 1 minute to read The Chargers’ offensive front is pretty banged up, but it appears they’ll get one of their top playmakers back for Sunday’s wild-card game against the Patriots.

title: Rumored Red Sox target Ketel Marte reportedly won’t be traded. What does it mean for Boston’s Alex Bregman pursuit?
author: Conor Roche
bullets: Boston Red Sox The Diamondbacks have been rumored as a potential landing spot for Bregman.
Ketel Marte had been rumored as a potential trade target for the Red Sox after two straight All-Star seasons with the Diamondbacks.

(AP Photo/Rick Scuteri) By Conor Roche January 9, 2026 | 4:01 PM 2 minutes to read The Red Sox can cross another big-name bat off their list of offseason targets, but it could help their chances of retaining Alex Bregman.
